alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:25PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Prowers, northern Baca and eastern Bent Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 524 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Lamar to 14 miles northeast of Two Buttes Reservoir to 9 miles northeast of Two Buttes. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamar and Granada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
